description: Detects Ryuk Ransomware command lines Author: Vasiliy Burov. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Ryuk Ransomware
query: (process.executable:(*\\net.exe OR *\\net1.exe) AND process.command_line:*stop* AND process.command_line:(*samss* OR *audioendpointbuilder* OR *unistoresvc_?????*))
